title: Nastasia - Barcelona(SP)
textContent: A fairytale place, with wonderful people, both in thoughts and in senses, the house where I always come back gladly! Petri House Roșia Montană!

seeAlso.text: You can ask Nastasia, on facebook, about her experience at Casa Petri...

title: Andreea - Brașov(RO)
textContent: Oamenii frumosi la gazde frumoase trag! Multam de hamace with a view, vibe creativ si activist, clatite cu zambet larg si respiro cu WiFiiiiiii :))) ca sa afle lumea ca suntem la Casa Petri si ce facem pe acolo. Raportam de pe baricade ca stocul de dor s-a refacut rapid si numaram weekendurile pana va trecem iar pragul!

Nice peoples comes to nice hosts! Thanks for the hammocks with a view, for the good and activist vibe, for the pancakes and for the good WiFiiiiiii :))). We already miss you guys and we count the weeks until we will return at Casa Petri.

seeAlso.text: You can ask Andreea, on facebook, about her experience at Casa Petri...

title: Felicia - Satu Mare(RO)
textContent: We spent 3 wonderful days at Casa Petri, we felt excellent here. We were impressed by the common sense and the calm of our host (Adi) and by the good food prepared by his neighbour (Alina). We will return here.

textContent: We spent 3 wonderful days at Casa Petri, we felt excellent here. We were impressed by the common sense and the calm of our host (Adi) and by the good food prepared by his neighbour (Alina). We will return here.

title: Ana von Aether - Paris(FR)
textContent: Thanks for the accomodation. It was a pleasure to meet you! I enjoyed a lot Fân Fest and if I'll come next year to the festival, I also want to stay at Casa Petri. Keep in touch!

title: Alex - Cluj(RO)
textContent: It was really cool! It's the most beautiful building from Roșia Montană and is right in the Historic Center!

seeAlso.text: Alex also made a clip with photos from his hiking trips to Cârnic and Țarina trails. You can see it here...

images.text: Alex - Cluj(RO) - with Sebi on Cârnic Peak

title: Josefen - Copenhagen(DK)
textContent: Romania still remains to be discovered as a very nice place to spend your holidays. A fantastic landscape and friendly people all makes it a pleasant experience to visit. Rosia Montana is particularly interesting for its history, geology, folklore and location and you don't find any better than the small, cosy and new restaurated Casuta Petri. Thank you very much for the stay

images.text: Josefen - Denmark - from our notebook with reviews

title: Alexandra - Bucharest(RO)
textContent: Thank you for this piece of heaven, where we felt wonderful. One of the biggest achievements is that I slept like a baby, while in Bucharest I have to take sleeping pills.

seeAlso.text: Alexandra loves Rosia Montana and she organizes annually a marathon here. More details here...

images.text: Alexandra - Bucharest(RO) - with the marathon team on 'Rotundu' Peak - Țarina

title: Ramona - Cluj(RO)
textContent: Adi and his father are the best hosts. I love to drink my coffee in the morning in their yard with a nice view to Carnic mountain.

seeAlso.text: Ramona with her team comes every year at the Fan Fest festival to sell organic seeds and she also holds workshop about the importance of the organic seeds in agriculture. More details here...

images.text: Ramona - Cluj(RO) - with her team at Fan Fest where they sell organic seeds.

title: Sophie & Alma - Leipzig(DE)
textContent: Căsuța Petri in Roșia Montană is for sure the perfect place for having the good and easy life. Thank you very much for the warm welcome and your overall hospitality! It was very 'fain' to celebrate Easter with you. Thanks to Tica and the Petri family we will surely remember the Romanian hospitality as of unprecedented awesomeness.

images.text: Sophie & Alma - Leipzig(DE) - from our notebook with reviews.

title: Livia - Cluj(RO)
textContent: For me is the first time when I come to Roșia Montană and I'm very glad that I had the opportunity to find this accommodation. The 'Books' room is wonderful and the place is very nice. I will always remember this place and the peoples that I meet here.

images.text: Livia - Cluj(RO) - from our notebook with reviews.

title: Shreya - Mumbai(India)
textContent: Dear Adi, Casa Petri is an amazing place. We are very sad to have to leave this beautiful house and village. But we can now say we have a home in Rosia Montana. You are a wonderful host and an amazing person. Hope to see Casa Petri, again soon. We will miss the peoples of Rosia Montana very much.

seeAlso.text: You can ask Shreya, on facebook, about her experience at Casa Petri...

images.text: Shreya, Hoowen and Bran - at a galass of Palinca with the locals

title: Valentina - Cluj(RO)
textContent: Two days were enough to find the charm and the beauty of Rosia Montana, but way to less to discover all. Thank you for the accommodation, for the guided tour, for the light and warm. We borrow a part of the energy from this place and we take back home a wealthiest version of us, with the history of the place, the locals stories, the breath taking view of the mountains, of the old houses, of the ages. An experience that changes you and brings you closer.

images.text: Valentina - Cluj(RO) - from our notebook with reviews.

title: Haowen - Taipei(Taiwan)
textContent: We are very sad to leave Casa Petri. Its now home for us. We enjoy our stay here and even more enjoyed the peoples of this beautiful town. You are doing a great job at Rosia Montana. See you soon. To Calin, our guide: We learnt a lot about Rosia Montana because of the lovely walk and the stories you told us. We had a good time with you. Multumesc.

title: Horațiu - Alba Iulia(RO)
textContent: Those from Casa Petri are great hosts, they always comes with something new and are open to any proposal of the guests. Once you visit them you will also visit all the beautiful and unique places of Rosia Montana... I really recommend this house to everyone!!!

title: The group from Arad(RO)
textContent: We had a really nice 'expedition' here in Rosia Montana with all the local stories, thanks to the host who loves his birth places, and knows a lot about the history and the heritage of this place. The visit to the Roman Galleries of Roșia Montană was an unique and unforgettable experience and the guide from there really has gold in his soul. The historic center tour with Calin filled the glass with places and stories from the village. Congratulation for planing this trip and for the restoration of your grandparents house. We have now unforgettable memories from this place and maybe the time will bring us again here - we really wish to stay longer than now.

images.text: The group from Arad(RO) - in the guided trail
The group from Arad(RO) - din caietul cu reviewuri

title: Verena's group - Hamburg(DE)
textContent: Marvellous for those who want to have a great experience in Rosia Montana. Very well situated in Rosia Montana, quiet, but in the middle of the village, a very nice place! Simple but convenient and nicely done with a backyard to sit outside and relax. What made our stay so exceptional was the kind and excellent help provided by the host for organizing our stay and tours. Adi's flexibility to adapt to his guests was great! Especially the tours together with the wonderful guide Calin were marvellous, with their wealth of knowledge about local history and the recent development, their friendliness and openness to share made it a great and exceptional experience - and also a lot of fun! The whole group of 15 students was very impressed, loved it and would have wanted to stay longer. We'll come back!
